item.text: King David was very old; even when they covered him with blankets, he could not get warm.

His <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">advised</st><n id="1" /> him, “A <st data-num="05291" class="">young</st> <st data-num="01330" class="">virgin</st> must be <st data-num="01245" class="">found</st> for our <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="05975" class="">take care</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">needs</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="01961" class="">serve</st> as his <st data-num="05532" class="">nurse</st>. She can also <st data-num="07901" class="">sleep</st> with <st data-num="02436" class="">you</st><n id="4" /> and keep our <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="02552" class="">warm</st>.”<n id="5" />

So they <st data-num="01245" class="">looked</st> through <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01366 03478">Israel</st><n id="1" /> for a <st data-num="03303" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">young woman</st> and <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="049" class="">Abishag</st>, a <st data-num="07767" class="">Shunammite</st>, and <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> her to the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.
The young woman was very beautiful; she became the king’s nurse and served him, but the king was not intimate with her.
Now Adonijah, son of David and Haggith, was promoting himself, boasting, “I will be king!” He managed to acquire chariots and horsemen, as well as 50 men to serve as his royal guard.

(Now his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> had <st data-num="03808 03117">never</st> <st data-num="06087" class="">corrected</st><n id="1" /> him<n id="2" /> by <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="04069" class="">Why</st> do you <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03602" class="">such things</st>?” <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> was <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="02896 08389">handsome</st> and had been <st data-num="03205" class="">born</st> right <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> <st data-num="053" class="">Absalom</st>.<n id="3" />)

<st data-num="01697" class="">He</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">collaborated</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="03097" class="">Joab</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06870" class="">Zeruiah</st> and <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="054" class="">Abiathar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, and they <st data-num="05826 0310">supported</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0138" class="">him</st>.<n id="3" />

But <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="01141" class="">Benaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03077" class="">Jehoiada</st>, <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st>, <st data-num="08096" class="">Shimei</st>, <st data-num="07472" class="">Rei</st>, and <st data-num="0834 01732">David’s</st> <st data-num="01368" class="">elite warriors</st><n id="1" /> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">ally</st> themselves<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st>.

<st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> <st data-num="02076" class="">sacrificed</st> <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st>, <st data-num="01241" class="">cattle</st>, and <st data-num="04806" class="">fattened steers</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="068" class="">Stone</st> of <st data-num="02120" class="">Zoheleth</st> <st data-num="0834 0681">near</st> <st data-num="05883" class="">En Rogel</st>. He <st data-num="07121" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>,<n id="1" /> as well as <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st>.
But he did not invite Nathan the prophet, Benaiah, the elite warriors, or his brother Solomon.
Nathan said to Bathsheba, Solomon’s mother, “Has it been reported to you that Haggith’s son Adonijah has become king behind our master David’s back?

<st data-num="06258 01980">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04994" class="">let</st> me <st data-num="03289">give</st> you some <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> as to how<n id="2" /> you can <st data-num="04422" class="">save</st> your <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> and your <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon’s</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st>.

<st data-num="01980 0935 0413">Visit</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, ‘My <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, O <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, did <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07650 0559">solemnly promise</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="0519" class="">servant</st>, “<st data-num="03588" class="">Surely</st> your <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> will <st data-num="04427" class="">be king</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> me; <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>”? So <st data-num="04069" class="">why</st> has <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> <st data-num="04427" class="">become king</st>?’
While you are still there speaking to the king, I will arrive and verify your report.”
So Bathsheba visited the king in his private quarters. (The king was very old, and Abishag the Shunammite was serving the king.)

<st data-num="01339" class="">Bathsheba</st> <st data-num="06915" class="">bowed</st> <st data-num="07812" class="">down on the floor before</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>. The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> do you want?”
She replied to him, “My master, you swore an oath to your servant by the Lord your God, ‘Solomon your son will be king after me and he will sit on my throne.’

But <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">look</st>, <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> has <st data-num="04427" class="">become king</st>! But <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>,<n id="1" /> my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, are <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> even <st data-num="03045">aware of it</st>!<n id="2" />

He has <st data-num="02076" class="">sacrificed</st> <st data-num="07230" class="">many</st> <st data-num="07794" class="">cattle</st>, <st data-num="04806" class="">steers</st>, and <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> and has <st data-num="07121" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="054" class="">Abiathar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, and <st data-num="03097" class="">Joab</st>, the <st data-num="08269" class="">commander</st> of the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st>, but he has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">invited</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>,<n id="1" /> my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, O <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> is <st data-num="05869" class="">watching</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">anxiously</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">to see</st> <st data-num="04310" class="">who</st> is <st data-num="05046" class="">named</st> to <st data-num="03427 0310">succeed</st> my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>.<n id="2" />
If a decision is not made, when my master the king is buried with his ancestors, my son Solomon and I will be considered state criminals.”
Just then, while she was still speaking to the king, Nathan the prophet arrived.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> was <st data-num="05046 0559">told</st>, “<st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> is <st data-num="02009" class="">here</st>.” Nathan <st data-num="0935 06440 04428">entered</st> and <st data-num="07812" class="">bowed</st> before the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="0639" class="">face</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">floor</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, O <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, did <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">announce</st>, ‘<st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> will <st data-num="04427" class="">be king</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> me; <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>’?

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> he has <st data-num="03381" class="">gone down</st> and <st data-num="02076" class="">sacrificed</st> <st data-num="07230" class="">many</st> <st data-num="07794" class="">cattle</st>, <st data-num="04806" class="">steers</st>, and <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> and has <st data-num="07121" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">commanders</st>, and <st data-num="054" class="">Abiathar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>. <st data-num="02009" class="">At this moment</st><n id="1" /> they are <st data-num="0398 08354">having a feast</st><n id="2" /> in his <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st>, and they have <st data-num="0559" class="">declared</st>, ‘<st data-num="02421" class="">Long live</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st>!’<n id="3" />

But he did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">invite</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">me</st>—your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st>—or <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, or <st data-num="01141" class="">Benaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03077" class="">Jehoiada</st>, or your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>.
Has my master the king authorized this without informing your servants who should succeed my master the king on his throne?”
King David responded, “Summon Bathsheba!” She came and stood before the king.
The king swore an oath: “As certainly as the Lord lives (he who has rescued me from every danger),
I will keep today the oath I swore to you by the Lord God of Israel: ‘Surely Solomon your son will be king after me; he will sit in my place on my throne.’”
Bathsheba bowed down to the king with her face to the floor and said, “May my master, King David, live forever!”
King David said, “Summon Zadok the priest, Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah son of Jehoiada.” They came before the king,

and <st data-num="04428" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> them, “<st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st> your <st data-num="0113" class="">master’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you, <st data-num="07392" class="">put</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">my</st> <st data-num="06506" class="">mule</st>, and <st data-num="03381" class="">lead</st> him <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01521" class="">Gihon</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="08033" class="">There</st> <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> and <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> will <st data-num="04886" class="">anoint</st><n id="1" /> him <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel;</st> then <st data-num="08628" class="">blow</st> the <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">declare</st>, ‘<st data-num="02421" class="">Long live</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>!’

Then <st data-num="05927 0310">follow</st> him <st data-num="05927 0310">up</st> as he <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="04427" class="">be king</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in</st> my <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st>; I have <st data-num="06680" class="">decreed</st><n id="1" /> that he will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05057" class="">ruler</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>.”
Benaiah son of Jehoiada responded to the king: “So be it! May the Lord God of my master the king confirm it!
As the Lord is with my master the king, so may he be with Solomon, and may he make him an even greater king than my master King David!”
So Zadok the priest, Nathan the prophet, Benaiah son of Jehoiada, the Kerethites, and the Pelethites went down, put Solomon on King David’s mule, and led him to Gihon.

<st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="07161" class="">horn</st> filled with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> and <st data-num="04886" class="">poured</st> it <st data-num="04886" class="">on</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>; the <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st> was <st data-num="08628" class="">blown</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">declared</st>, “<st data-num="02421" class="">Long live</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>!”
All the people followed him up, playing flutes and celebrating so loudly they made the ground shake.
Now Adonijah and all his guests heard the commotion just as they had finished eating. When Joab heard the sound of the trumpet, he asked, “Why is there such a noisy commotion in the city?”

As he was <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">speaking</st>, <st data-num="02009 03129">Jonathan</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="054" class="">Abiathar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st>. <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Come in</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st><n id="2" /> an <st data-num="02428" class="">important</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> like <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> must be <st data-num="01319" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="01319" class="">news</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03129" class="">Jonathan</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">replied</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah:</st> “<st data-num="061" class="">No</st>!<n id="2" /> Our <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> has <st data-num="04427" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="04427" class="">king</st>.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st>, <st data-num="01141" class="">Benaiah</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03077" class="">Jehoiada</st>, the <st data-num="03774" class="">Kerethites</st>, and the <st data-num="06432" class="">Pelethites</st> and they <st data-num="07392" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="06506" class="">mule</st>.

Then <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> and <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="04886" class="">anointed</st><n id="1" /> him <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> in <st data-num="01521" class="">Gihon</st>. They <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="08056" class="">rejoicing</st>, and the <st data-num="07151" class="">city</st> <st data-num="01949" class="">is in an uproar</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">That</st> is the <st data-num="06963 0834">sound</st> you <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st>.

<st data-num="01571" class="">Furthermore</st>, <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> has <st data-num="03427 05921">assumed</st> the <st data-num="04410" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> have <st data-num="01571" class="">even</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="01288" class="">congratulate</st><n id="1" /> our <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, ‘May your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03190" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> more <st data-num="08034" class="">famous</st> than <st data-num="08034" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="01431" class="">make</st> him an even <st data-num="01431" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="03678" class="">king</st> than <st data-num="03678" class="">you</st>!’<n id="4" /> Then the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="07812" class="">leaned</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st>
and said this: ‘The Lord God of Israel is worthy of praise because today he has placed a successor on my throne and allowed me to see it.’”
All of Adonijah’s guests panicked; they jumped up and rushed off their separate ways.

<st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> <st data-num="03372 06440">feared</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>, so he <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="02388" class="">grabbed hold</st> of the <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> was <st data-num="05046 0559">told</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="0138" class="">Adonijah</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fears</st> <st data-num="04428 08010">you</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">see</st>, he has <st data-num="0270" class="">taken hold</st> of the <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> of the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, ‘May <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="07650" class="">solemnly promise</st><n id="2" /> me <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st> that he will <st data-num="0518" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> his <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> with the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.’”

<st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="02428" class="">loyal</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">subject</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="08185" class="">hair</st> of his head will be <st data-num="05307 0776">harmed</st>, but <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> he is <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> to be a <st data-num="07451" class="">traitor</st>,<n id="2" /> he will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.”
King Solomon sent men to bring him down from the altar. He came and bowed down to King Solomon, and Solomon told him, “Go home.”
